title.rendered: Car Head rest for Neck and Shoulder Support (Bone Shape)

content.rendered:
ERGONOMIC SHAPE:

Rise & Shine’s Car Neck pillows have the unique design to keep your neck, shoulder and spine aligned to eliminate pain while traveling. The Car Neck pillow also come with the size adjustable strap.

 

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM:

Made up of imported materials these memory foam Neck pillows bring you the most comfortable Journey. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-elastic memory foam.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL:

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the pillow to become hard in winters.

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Neck & Shoulder pain relief
  • Greater air flow & Refreshing Sleep
  • Relief from Sleep problems during travelling
  • Invented by “NASA”
  • Total Value for Money

OUTER COVER:

We provide a premium cotton Mesh fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent. The Neck pillow also comes with the size adjustable strap which will be perfect for all.

excerpt.rendered:
When it is about comfortable traveling you should carry Rise & Shine’s Car Neck pillow with you. Car Neck pillow prevents our neck from dropping around and aligns our Neck, Spine and shoulder. These pillows will make your car journey much more comfortable and you will not have a sore or stiff neck at the end of the journey. So just wrap the pillow around the seat and let your Neck & Shoulder muscles relax so that you can enjoy your ride.

 

The car Neck Pillow ensures the safety of the Neck & Spine during the acceleration & Deceleration of the vehicles.
